SEARCH
Package controller.lobby

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
controller.lobby.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Lobby extends Object implements Serializable
Class to handle lobby operations It contains the lobby name and the list of players' names. You can initialize a lobby with a the name of the lobby and the name of the player creating it (the lobby's host). Add players with `addPlayer(name)` and remove them with `removePlayer(name)`.
See Also:
